parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air dryer bracket can cause the air dryer to hang loose, potentially leading to brake failure, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The air dryer bracket is cracked or broken
the air dryer is not secured to the frame
the air dryer is hanging on the airline with a piece of the broken bracket.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Haldex brake can can cause the brakes to drag and overheat, leading to a fire, which can result in a total loss of the vehicle, trailer, and load.
symptoms: The brakes are smoking while driving
the brakes are dragging
the brakes are overheating
a fire starts under the truck and trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the mitigation system can cause sudden and unexpected hard braking, which can lead to loss of control, accidents, or rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly brakes hard
the vehicle slows down rapidly
the brakes are applied without driver input
the mitigation system triggers a hard braking event.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective DPF System and Sensor Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DPF system and sensor issues can cause the check engine light to remain on, leading to decreased engine performance, reduced fuel efficiency, and potential engine damage.
symptoms: The check engine light remains on
the vehicle experiences decreased engine performance
reduced fuel efficiency
error codes such as P3770
and repeated failures of NOS sensors and input and output sensors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear end can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences rear end failure
requiring replacement of the rear end.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt system can lead to compromised safety in the event of an accident, and can also cause distractions and disruptions while driving.
symptoms: The seat belt frame cover is cracked
the seat belt will not retract
the seat belt casing comes off
the seat belt alarm fails to turn off even when the seat belt is worn
the driver's seat folds forward unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning AEB system can cause unexpected and sudden hard stops, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities. False radar returns and unwanted braking can also cause driver frustration, loss of control, and increased stopping distances.
symptoms: Unwanted hard stops
false radar returns
sudden and unexpected braking
flashing warning lights
vehicle stopping unnecessarily
adaptive cruise control malfunctioning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning adaptive cruise control system can cause unexpected and sudden hard stops, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities. False radar returns and unwanted braking can also cause driver frustration, loss of control, and increased stopping distances.
symptoms: Unwanted hard stops
false radar returns
sudden and unexpected braking
flashing warning lights
vehicle stopping unnecessarily
adaptive cruise control malfunctioning in specific weather conditions (snow
ice).

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, as well as potential harm to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The brakes lock up
the traction control light comes on
the adaptive cruise control notification appears
the speedometer sign with an exclamation mark appears and does not go away
the rear passenger tires wear down excessively.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the ABS/ESC system can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and damage to the vehicle, as well as potential harm to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The traction control light comes on
the adaptive cruise control notification appears
the speedometer sign with an exclamation mark appears and does not go away
the brakes lock up
the vehicle loses control.
